title: Unranked S1 Veteran looking for Team.
body:
Greets Summoner, I am Atomic and have recently found myself playing league after a 12 month break. 
In the past I was a support main, though I have experience in every role given the length of time between seasons[S1-S4], but I have no intentions towards investing my time to main another role - while limiting it provides the ability to focus earnestly on a specific role.  

So if you're interested in a person who wants to learn the league feel free to send a invitation my way, whether for casual or serious play.
